strapiPost.title: Art On The Bricks Art Walk This Thursday in Rogers With Special Guest
strapiPost.content:
Downtown Rogers is attracting new and exciting events all the time and continues to be a center for creativity and collaborations in Northwest Arkansas. 

  • Defying gravity: The Art on the Bricks Art Walk theme for June is "Perpetual Motion," named after an aerial dance company performing this week in Downtown Rogers as a part of a national tour. The original concert, Y20, "quite literally elevates dance and movement in Northwest Arkansas."
  • Energy & momentum: There are four opportunities to experience Perpetual Motion Dance this week, starting today with a public aerial class at the Arkansas Arts Academy at 6p. The group will perform once tomorrow and twice during Art on the Bricks Art Walk on Thursday.

For more information about locations and times, click HERE.
